role_default.description: Auto-population as requirement during role creation

setter_id.description: User id of the user who created this record

generic_name.description: Generic location name, used for hiding actual location name

sex.description: Controls element visibilty to males, females or both

display_order.description: Display order in drop down select

shift_role_id.description: Role the pay item belongs to

outsource_company_id.description: Outsource company the staff is assigned through

times_locked.description: Determines if staff can change start & end times

location_id.description: Location id the shift is at, if stored

generic_title.description: Generic title is used to hide the shift title from unselected staff eg. Softdrink sampling

generic_location.description: Generic location used to hide location from unselected staff eg supermarket

address.description: Locaton address eg. 1 Hay St, Perth, WA 6000

reports_submitted.description: Indicates if all reports have been submitted

staff_paid.description: Indicates if all staff have been paid

apply_all_or_nothing.description: When set forces all staff to apply for all matching named roles in group or none at all

shift_id.description: Id of the shift the role belongs to

outsource_company_id.description: Id of the outsource company the role may belong to

pay_category_id.description: Id of the pay category that may be assigned

num_required.description: Number of staff required for the role

sex.description: Controls role applicability to males, females or any sex

completion_notes.description: Notes to be shown for completiong

role_staff_id.description: Id of role staff the pay item is attached to

role_pay_item_id.description: Id of role pay item this pay item may have come from

user_lvl.description: User level the term applies to eg. staff

required.description: Controls if required at shift creation

tracking_cat_id.description: Id of tracking category the option belongs to

staff_visibility.description: Sets visibility to all staff or team only

active.description: Sets visibility in search and filters

user_id.description: Id of user the unavailability belongs to

weekday.description: null for irregular unavailability otherwise indicates day of week for recurring unavailability

lvl.description: Type of user controls what functions are available and what content is visible

ppic_a.description: Profile photo will be stored as [usr_id]ppic_a where ppic_a will be char incremented a,b,c ect. + file extension eg. a.jpg

active.description: Status of user. Cannot login if not active.

works_here.description: Indicates if user works directly for this company as opposed to an outsource company

aname.description: Work area name eg. Bar 1, Perth
